short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to get notifications from soccersuck.com!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension for showing user notification from soccersuck.com and can be sent as notification to let you know any activities from website.

Must be login before.
